#include<stdio.h>
inline int fastio()
{
     int t=0;
     char ch;
     ch=getchar_unlocked();
     while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')
     ch=getchar_unlocked();
     while(ch<='9'&& ch>='0')
     {
                     t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+ch-'0';
                     ch=getchar_unlocked();
     }
     return t;
}

main()
{
    int t;
    t=fastio();
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        n=fastio();
        if( n%49==0 && n%343!=0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
